edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.animation

Interface Animation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyframeAnimation

    public interface Animation
    Interface representing an abstract animation, which defines the Orientation of an object over time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getDuration()
      Returns the duration in seconds.
      Orientation sample(double time)
      Samples the Orientation of this animation at the given time between 0 and duration.
      void setIndexWrap(IndexWrapMode mode)
      Sets the strategy used to handle keyframe index values that are outside of the range 0 ...
      void setTimeWrap(TimeWrapMode mode)
      Sets the strategy used to handle time values that are outside the range 0 ...

    • Method Detail

      • getDuration

        double getDuration()
        Returns the duration in seconds.
        Returns:
        the duration of this animation

      • sample

        Orientation sample(double time)
        Samples the Orientation of this animation at the given time between 0 and duration.
        Parameters:
        time - between 0 and duration
        Returns:
        returns the interpolated orientation (aka the translation, rotate, and scale of the animation at the given time).

      • setIndexWrap

        void setIndexWrap(IndexWrapMode mode)
        Sets the strategy used to handle keyframe index values that are outside of the range 0 ... # frames.
        Parameters:
        mode - wrap mode

      • setTimeWrap

        void setTimeWrap(TimeWrapMode mode)
        Sets the strategy used to handle time values that are outside the range 0 ... duration.
        Parameters:
        mode - wrap mode
